nodes.bodyText: Put a blank line between tests
Agree, good to know that exists! Also will allow me to not change test to be able to allow expression evaluation.

remove putSFTPRunner.run();
test case should pass without it as well
No guarantee of order of provenance events unless separate runs for result assertions.
Assuming you agree with comments above, this can be removed (as well as from lines 137/138 as well)
Agree that since replacing test with method above, no longer required. Will remove.
Required to ensure order of provenance events.
